title: Desert Soldier (4U220)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Raider
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Minion • Man
Strength:	9
Vitality:	2
Site:	4
Game Text:	Southron. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may remove (3) to wound a companion or ally he is skirmishing.
Lore:	”'Not nice; very cruel wicked Men they look.'”
Rarity:	U
Notes:	Version: +.
